steamDev.desc: I'm a game developer! This is the Steam developer page for my main and big projects.

itchio.desc: Mini projects, game jams, and prototypes. Used for games that are not on Steam. (Usually)

github.desc: My Github profile, where most of my projects are stored. I use it as a "secondary" portfolio.

backloggd.desc: In here I keep a backlog of the games that I've played. Comes with reviews aswell!

bluesky.desc: Mainly used for consuming content and talking about some stuff that I find interesting. (You should follow me...)

bandcamp.desc: Check out my music! I'm learning as I go, and I'm doing this in my "off time", so there isn't much content.

lastfm.desc: A platform where you can check what I listen to, barely used, as I scrobble on the background usually.

discord.desc: My discord is "@lumiug", add me if you'd like to have a chat. Click on this to join my dev server.

steamPlayer.desc: Obsessed with rhythm, puzzles and platformer games. "Have you heard of that new Indie Game?" Yep, already played it.

youtube.desc: I used to make videos in the past. Right now this is only for archival purposes and small things that I post online.
